title: How to Set Up Bluetooth on an iPhone

steps.headline: Place a Bluetooth device near your iPhone.
steps.description: Make sure the Bluetooth device is charged.

steps.headline: Press the pairing button.
steps.description: The instructions that came with your Bluetooth device will describe where the button is located and how many times you should press or how long you should hold down the button.

steps.headline: Open your iPhone's Settings.
steps.description: It's a gray app that contains gears (⚙️) and is typically located on your home screen.

steps.headline: Tap Bluetooth.
steps.description: It's near the top of the menu.

steps.headline: Tap the name of the Bluetooth device.
steps.description: It will appear in the "OTHER DEVICES" section. Once the device is paired, it will appear in the "MY DEVICES" section of the menu.

text: Place a Bluetooth device near your iPhone. Make sure the Bluetooth device is charged. Press the pairing button. The instructions that came with your Bluetooth device will describe where the button is located and how many times you should press or how long you should hold down the button. Open your iPhone's Settings. It's a gray app that contains gears (⚙️) and is typically located on your home screen. Tap Bluetooth. It's near the top of the menu. Slide "Bluetooth" to the "On" position. It will turn green. Tap the name of the Bluetooth device. It will appear in the "OTHER DEVICES" section. Once the device is paired, it will appear in the "MY DEVICES" section of the menu.
sentences: Place a Bluetooth device near your iPhone.
Make sure the Bluetooth device is charged.
The instructions that came with your Bluetooth device will describe where the button is located and how many times you should press or how long you should hold down the button.
It's a gray app that contains gears (⚙️) and is typically located on your home screen.
It's near the top of the menu.
Tap the name of the Bluetooth device.
It will appear in the "OTHER DEVICES" section.
Once the device is paired, it will appear in the "MY DEVICES" section of the menu.
